meanings: hemostasis, check[stop, arrest] the bleeding, control hemorrhage, (Am) stanch, (Brit) staunch
wrap the bandage around the wound to stop the bleeding

vlive.korean: 맞아 어떡해 - 어떻게 지혈해줄 건데? Right. Oh man. - How will you stop it? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] DREAMCATCHER X Rooftop Live - 드림캐쳐의 루프탑라이브!
vlive.english: Right. Oh man. - How will you stop it?

vlive.korean: "지훈이는 응급처치 배우는 중이구나"라는 댓글이 - 지혈 배우고 있어? "Jihoon is learning how to stop bleeding". - Are you learning how to stop bleeding? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] KNK X CouchTalk - 크나큰 X 카우치토크
vlive.english: "Jihoon is learning how to stop bleeding". - Are you learning how to stop bleeding?

vlive.korean: 지혈해야 돼요. Apply pressure to the wound. 듣기 View video Dispatch : "먹방이 별거냐!"....범주&백호(NU'EST W)의 베트남 음식 먹방

examples.korean: The nurse used a wad of cotton wool to stop the bleeding. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 간호사는 솜뭉치를 써서 지혈을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The nurse used a wad of cotton wool to stop the bleeding. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She tried to stop the flow of blood from the wound. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 상처에서 흐르는 피를 지혈하려 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She tried to stop the flow of blood from the wound. Add to Wordbook
